Bavati saqttvamEqvaina#M gamayati vAthsaqprENOpa# tiShThata EqtEnaq vai va#thsaqprIrBA#landaqnO$&gnEH priqyaM dhAmA&vA#&rundhAq&gnErEqvaitEna# priqyaM dhAmA&va# rundha EkAdaqSaM Ba#vatyEkaqdhaiva yaja#mAnE vIqrya#M dadhAtiq stOmE#naq vai dEqvA aqsmin ~MlOqka A$d^^rdhnuvaqn CandO#BiraqmuShmiqnth stOma#syEvaq Kaluq vA 
Eqtad-rUqpaM ~Myad-vA$thsaqpraM ~Myad-vA$thsaqprENO#paqtiShTha#ta - [  ] 6
